tasks.title: Practice useContext and the use of Router-dom in React
tasks.description: Review how to use the React Context API to manage global state and practice implementing React Router for navigation between pages.

tasks.title: Write one page in your gratitude diary
tasks.description: Take a moment to reflect on positive experiences and write at least one page about things you are grateful for today.

tasks.title: Train upper body in the gym 1 hour
tasks.description: Focus on upper body strength training, including exercises for shoulders, chest, back, and arms. Maintain proper form and intensity.
